title: Flail of Ages
content: Flail of Ages Rare 2~9 Damage 1d8 +1 Bludgeoning Elements of an Epoch: Depending on what kind of damage this weapon does, it also inflicts: Acid condition, Chilled condition, or Burning condition. Weapon Enchantment +1 Elemental Age Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal 1 Bludgeoning damage anyway.
